[tags]: 
How to set the starting value of simulated ARIMA

I need to simulate an ARIMA(24,1,24) and I need it to start in the value 201.9. I use this code: AR=c(rep(0,15),-0.4153,0,-0.2756,0.0648,rep(0,4),0.4113) MA=c(0.0333,rep(0,15),0.4086,0,-0.159,rep(0,4),-0.4373) set.seed(201.9) test=arima.sim(model=list(ar=AR,1,ma=MA),48,sd=sqrt(0.04114)) but the result is > test Time Series: Start = 1 End = 48 Frequency = 1 [1] -0.27316579 0.20749619 -0.12835911 0.12214197 -0.22945806 0.13178123 [7] 0.04573641 0.36200390 -0.46684265 0.29717346 -0.31135894 0.13539167 [13] 0.21997990 -0.35134322 0.49790011 -0.42154630 0.35056175 0.03470862 [19] 0.66058853 -0.08921610 0.29556006 0.08122176 0.38895428 -0.25651422 [25] -0.22049509 -0.06415654 0.07688333 -0.12579347 0.25334491 0.11758624 [31] -0.29212792 0.56738316 -0.58642879 0.06029231 -0.29947094 0.37453197 [37] -0.14767161 -0.47551637 0.27601816 0.04543016 -0.21988223 -0.04854361 [43] 0.42858816 0.31826853 0.34349185 0.03578720 0.02682161 -0.61197084 I need to see results like this for example: [1] 205.6630 243.8738 233.7408 253.4030 243.6766 339.0593 356.5167 258.3706 [9] 247.8154 213.7239 197.0198 177.9323 177.5526 169.4676 153.2032 169.8762 [17] 224.1862 233.1749 236.1136 228.4079 240.0980 233.0451 203.8956 202.9322 [25] 191.9604 232.1895 221.7581 244.5288 254.1557 269.4983 317.5880 297.0995 [33] 264.6354 235.3557 186.9068 191.8556 204.5835 181.4777 183.1193 181.4503 [41] 231.8501 241.2742 248.7449 243.2180 235.2816 234.1833 201.5701 204.0210 What can I do to make the correct simulation?
